'''Radiant Spincrystal 50''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[The Mysterious Islands]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located behind [[Ioroi]] in [[Chinju Forest]].
